comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: I wonder if this could be another Bain naming error? The picture might actually depict Mary E. Miller. Mary is the subject of the third section of this September 2, 1915, N.Y. Times file. Mary Elizabeth Miller was a 14 year old who swam across the Hudson and back on September 1, 1915.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: whyaduck: It seems possible that this could be a spelling error. We'll add Mary to the source catalog, with the caution of "probably" until more information turns up. Thanks!
